# Temperature Over Time

```{r, results='asis', message=F, echo=F, fig.align='center', fig.cap="Temperature over Time"}
source("load_packages.r")
dat <- read.csv("formated_data.csv")
library(tidyverse)
ggplot(dat, aes(x=X, y=TempC)) +
  geom_line() +
  xlab("Days") +
  ylab("Temperature (in C)")
```
